problem_text_cn: 如图,点C是长为10cm的线段AB上一点,D、E分别是AC、CB中点,则DE的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, point C is a point on the line segment AB with length N_0, D and E are the midpoints of AC and CB respectively, then the length of DE is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:如图,∵点D、E分别是线段AC、CB的中点,∴DC=\frac{1}{2}AC,CE=\frac{1}{2}BC,∴DE=DC+CE=\frac{1}{2}(AC+BC)=\frac{1}{2}AB．又∵AB=10cm,∴DE=5cm；
raw_comment: 本题考查了两点间的距离．
